welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Raytown, a charming city known for its friendly community and beautiful parks. We invite you to explore and discover all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lee's Summit Municipal Airport is a small but modern facility with all the necessary amenities for travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Downtown Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Downtown Airport caters to private and corporate flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Johnson Executive Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Johnson Executive Airport caters to private and charter flights, providing a more exclusive and luxurious experience.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic flights for airlines such as American Airlines, Delta, and United.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for airlines such as Alaska Airlines, Southwest, and Air Canada.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic flights for airlines such as Frontier and Spirit.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of New Century Aircenter Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for regional flights, located on the east side of the airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
